text.content: Some guys fall in love with one girl, I gotta fall for two  There's just so much loving that one heart's supposed to do  So I go around with my heart dragging on the ground  Dogging me around, I'm the sorriest sight in town    I got double trouble, I got double trouble  I got double trouble twice as much as anybody else oh yeah!

I guess there's gotta be two dark clouds hanging over me  My future looks a bumpy as a matchbox on the sea  Every time I think that I have finally got it made  Some losing cards are played, I just can't make the grade
